name: Dices Vs Virus
description:
The goal of the game is to launch dices to the enemies, but be careful of lauching the right dice's color to the right virus' color. Otherwise your dice will not kill the enemy!

Reroll them in your base area to get the right color. And get within the time new types of dices!

And then launch them into the battleground! And survive of a maximum of viruses!

Credits:

Game devs: Hippolyte Azalbert & Erwann Pottier (BnB Games)

Music: Surreal sippin & Icarus from Turbo

Different SFXs from Gaming Sound Effects Library Zyarathon

Use of Kenney Game Assets

Use of Gap Sans Font by Alexandre Lizard & Etienne Ozeray

Background by PDD

Known issues:

- Game can be really whacky w/ UltraWide monitors, try to not maximize the windows and keep the actual ratio

- Turrets just stop shooting at some point, because God's know why

- Game isn't playable with any controller, just use your mouse
